name: The Starlit Escape
description:
The Starlit Escape! A Game Boy style Metroidvania about exploring a haunted space station and meeting ghosts along the way! Made in the month of October for Halloween!

Features:

  • Fully connected world map that you can explore more of as you unlock new abilities! (There's the Metroidvania part)
  • Meet and befriend ghosts along your adventure, each with their own special ability to help!
  • Lots of boss battles!
  • Tons of hidden items and secrets!
  • Upgrade your ghosts powers by purchasing special items from shops!
  • Original Game Boy soundtrack!
  • A talking vending machine!
  • Made by one person!
  • TWO talking vending machines?

Version history / Change log:
